name: Blitz
headline: Build apps, automate tasks, and scale operations with zero code.
description:
Blitz is a no-code platform to build internal applications and automate manual tasks. Quickly build a database, integrate your logic, and scale your operations. 

Alternative to Google Sheet and Airtable, Blitz is not limited by a number of lines of records or by an API rate. 

Create your data model and set up data validation rules. Use our interface builder to create dynamic forms, and quickly onboard customer and partners. Leverage our granular permissions to share data to external users (publicly or privately). Add advanced business logic to your forms and portals, without writing any line of code. The experience is similar to creating spreadsheets, but without their limitations in terms of scalability and security. 

You can use Blitz to build an onboarding flow, an order management system or some validation workflows for compliance purposes. 

Stop using developer resources or rigid SaaS software. Start building your own tools, adapted to your needs, with Blitz.

### Company Profile: Blitz

**Founding & Team**  
Blitz was founded in 2022 and is currently part of Y Combinator‚Äôs Batch S22. The company is located in Paris, France, and boasts a small, dedicated team of four employees, led by Group Partner Nicolas Dessaigne.

**Mission**  
Blitz aims to empower businesses to build applications, automate tasks, and scale operations‚Äîall with zero coding required. They provide an intuitive no-code platform designed to simplify the process of creating internal applications that streamline workflows and improve operational efficiency.

**Core Offering**  
Initially, Blitz positioned itself as a robust alternative to tools like Google Sheets and Airtable, overcoming limitations on record lines and API rates. With Blitz, users can:

- **Define Data Models**: Create and manage data using an easy-to-use interface to establish validation rules.
- **Build Dynamic Interfaces**: Use their drag-and-drop interface builder to create dynamic forms, which aid in onboarding customers and partners.
- **Granular Permissions**: Share data with external users while controlling access levels‚Äîwhether publicly or privately.
- **Business Logic Integration**: Add complex business logic without writing a single line of code.

Blitz allows businesses to transition away from wasteful spreadsheet reliance and rigid SaaS solutions. Instead, it empowers teams to build tailored tools that closely align with their operational needs. 

**Use Cases**  
With Blitz, companies can assemble an array of custom applications, including:

- Onboarding workflows
- Order management systems
- Compliance validation procedures

In essence, Blitz is ideal for any team looking to construct custom business applications quickly and iteratively, without the bottleneck of needing developer resources.

**Competitive Advantage**  
The platform reduces dependency on traditional developers and minimizes risk associated with bloated tech stacks. Its high-performance architecture is powered by graph databases, ensuring that apps remain scalable and secure as business needs grow.

**Engagement Opportunities**  
Blitz is currently inviting users to join their beta program, allowing early adopters to gain firsthand experience with the platform. Interested users can sign up on their [website](https://www.blitznocode.com/).

**Tags**: SaaS, B2B, No-Code

In short, Blitz is carving out a significant niche in the no-code realm, advocating for a future where anyone can turn ideas into operational tools without the need for coding expertise. If you're tired of waiting on developers or juggling multiple applications, Blitz might just be the breath of fresh air your team needs.
